AppDB.Name: L2_FORWARD_UNKNOWN_DA_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress table describing unknown DA flooding destination

Field.Description: If True UNKNOWN_DA_DESTINATION from the vsi is added to the DESTINATION
Field.Name: ADD_VSI_DEST

AppDB.Name: MACT_VSI_COUNTERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MACT Counters per VSI

Field.Description: Holds the number of MACT entries per vsi
Field.Name: COUNTER

AppDB.Name: VSI_LEARNING_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds VSI profile ID for each VSI

Field.Description: Limit number of entries in VSI or LIF
Field.Name: VSI_LEARNING_PROFILE

AppDB.Name: VSI_LEARNING_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: VSI profile for learning related properties

Field.Description: Limit number of entries in VSI or LIF
Field.Name: LEARN_LIMIT

Field.Description: Enable interrupts of limit cross
Field.Name: INTERRUPT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable DSPs of limit cross
Field.Name: MESSAGE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Profile for DSPs distribution
Field.Name: EVENT_FORWARDING_PROFILE

Field.Description: Profile for events creation per age state
Field.Name: AGE_PROFILE

Field.Description: Allow different frequencies of the cycle period
Field.Name: CYCLE_MASK

AppDB.Name: MACT_APP_DB_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MACT app DB configuration

Field.Description: True if the app db is in the large EM db
Field.Name: IS_LARGE_EM

Field.Description: True if the app db is used for learning
Field.Name: IS_MACT

AppDB.Name: MACT_APP_DB_INDEX_TO_APP_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: maps APP_DB_INDEX(2b) to APP_DB(6b)

AppDB.Name: MACT_AGING_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: define which events should be raised in each age state and profile

Field.Description: Refreshed by DSP indication. Valid only for insert, refresh and learn commands.
Field.Name: RBD

Field.Description: Raise an age out event
Field.Name: AGE_OUT

Field.Description: Raise a refresh event
Field.Name: AGE_REFRESH

Field.Description: Delete the MAC entry locally
Field.Name: AGE_DELETE

AppDB.Name: FLUSH_MACHINE_GENERAL_PARAMS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: General configurations and status params of the flush machine

Field.Description: Work status of the flush machine
Field.Name: MACHINE_STATUS

AppDB.Name: MACT_MANAGEMENT_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: General configuration of the MACT management

Field.Description: If set the management request OLP interface is accesible through the register interface.
Field.Name: OLP_INTERFACE_ENABLE

Field.Description: If set the management of the MACT is made by the CPU (ARM). MACT machines are disabled.
Field.Name: MNGMNT_BY_CPU

Field.Description: If set get ACKs only on failure.
Field.Name: MNGNT_ACK_ONLY_FAILURE

Field.Description: MAC entry strength threshold. Larger strength for static entries, otherwise dynamic.
Field.Name: DYNAMIC_STRENGTH_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Max number of entries in the MACT.
Field.Name: MACT_DB_ENTRIES_LIMIT

Field.Description: Enable the VSI limit check
Field.Name: CHECK_VSI_LIMIT

Field.Description: Enable the MACT limit check
Field.Name: CHECK_MACT_DB_LIMIT

Field.Description: Check VSI limit before creating a learn event.
Field.Name: LEARN_EVENT_CHECK_VSI_LIMIT

Field.Description: Check MACT limit before creating a learn event.
Field.Name: LEARN_EVENT_CHECK_MACT_DB_LIMIT

Field.Description: If set then the LEM will signal the OLP and CPU when a valid event is ready for read.
Field.Name: EVENT_FIFO_ENABLE_OLP

Field.Description: Periodic scan cycles interval. Number of 100 clock units per age cycle.
Field.Name: CYCLE_RATE

Field.Description: Enable/Disable the automatic run of the age machine
Field.Name: MACHINE_AUTO_EN

Field.Description: Holds the number of MACT entries
Field.Name: MACT_ENTRY_COUNTER

Field.Description: If set then all packet copies are learned (i.e. not only first copy). Learn all copies
Field.Name: LEARN_ALL_COPIES

Field.Description: Destination prefix used for Jericho mode. Use Jericho 1 prefix.
Field.Name: SYS_PORT_PREFIX

Field.Description: Bitmap, if cleared, need to compare relevant MactDbIdMactId bit to relevant Entry.Key bit.
Field.Name: MACT_DB_ID_MACT_MASK

Field.Description: Bitmap, if cleared, need to compare relevant BMactDbIdMactId bit to relevant Entry.Key bit.
Field.Name: MACT_DB_ID_BMACT_MASK

Field.Description: Bitmap, if cleared, need to compare relevant ProgDbIdMactId bit to relevant Entry.Key bit.
Field.Name: MACT_DB_ID_PROG_MASK

Field.Description: Disable ECC in MACT block.
Field.Name: DISABLE_ECC

AppDB.Name: MACT_LIMIT_EXCEED_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure whether to drop the MAC entry add request

Field.Description: True if the limit was not crossed. False otherwise.
Field.Name: LIMIT_CHECK_PASS

Field.Description: True if the operation was done by the CPU.
Field.Name: IS_HOST_REQUEST

Field.Description: True if the requested entry's strength is larger than the dynamic threshold.
Field.Name: IS_STATIC

Field.Description: Drop if the global MACT limit is crossed.
Field.Name: DROP_IF_EXCEED_MACT_LIMIT

Field.Description: Drop if the VSI limit is crossed.
Field.Name: DROP_IF_EXCEED_VSI_LIMIT

AppDB.Name: MACT_PROFILE_POINTER_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure where bits chosen to be mapped to profile will be situated on learn entry

Field.Description: Pointer offset in learn Entry
Field.Name: POINTER_OFFSET

Field.Description: Size of pointer
Field.Name: POINTER_SIZE

AppDB.Name: OLP_DSP_EVENT_ROUTE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: OLP events distribution

Field.Description: Forwarding profile ID.
Field.Name: EVENT_FORWARDING_PROFILE

Field.Description: OLP command type.
Field.Name: OLP_COMMAND

Field.Description: Allow different events distribution per APPDB index.
Field.Name: MACT_APP_DB_INDEX

Field.Description: Distribute the DSP to a multicast group
Field.Name: OLP_DISTRIBUTION_MC

Field.Description: Distribute the DSP to a CPU
Field.Name: OLP_DISTRIBUTION_CPU

Field.Description: Distribute the OLP command to a CPU using DMA
Field.Name: OLP_DISTRIBUTION_CPU_DMA

AppDB.Name: OLP_HEADER_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Wrapper header to the DSPs from the OLP

Field.Description: UDH over ITMH header over PTCH2
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet without vlan over UDH over ITMH over PTCH2
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet with vlan over UDH over ITMH over PTCH2
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: UDH over ITMH
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet without vlan over UDH over ITMH
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet with vlan over UDH over ITMH
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet without vlan over ITMH
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet with vlan over ITMH
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet without vlan over ITMH over PTCH2
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

Field.Description: Ethernet with vlan over ITMH over PTCH2
Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE

Field.Description: Pad the header to 32 bytes
Field.Name: OLP_HEADER_PADDING

AppDB.Name: OLP_DSP_ENGINE_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the header of the DSPs from the OLP

Field.Description: DSP minimum size in bytes: If packet is smaller, 0 padding is added. Must be configured to even values.
Field.Name: MIN_DSP_SIZE

Field.Description: Maxium number of commands in a packet minus one.
Field.Name: MAX_CMD_DELAY

Field.Description: 1 for generating DSPs. When 0 DSPs are not generated.
Field.Name: DSP_GENERATION_ENABLE

Field.Description: DSP Header size in Bytes. Valid values are 1 through 32.
Field.Name: DSP_HEADER_SIZE

AppDB.Name: OLP_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the event fifo properties

Field.Description: Mask for comparison only valid bits are checked
Field.Name: DSP_IDENTIFIER_MASK

Field.Description: Two bytes ID to determine this is a DSP
Field.Name: DSP_IDENTIFIER_ID

Field.Description: If Set, Identifier Check is perfomed
Field.Name: DSP_IDENTIFIER_CHECK

Field.Description: Number of bytes to skip from the start of the DSP until the ID
Field.Name: DSP_IDENTIFIER_BYTES_TO_SKIP

Field.Description: Number of bytes to skip from the start of the DSP until the first command. Valid range 2-32
Field.Name: DSP_FIRST_CMD_OFFSET

Field.Description: Should be set to 1 when non-jr2 device in the system.
Field.Name: IS_JR_MODE

Field.Description: If set, learn events to MACT will be generated with INSERT command
Field.Name: LEL_USE_INSERT_CMD

AppDB.Name: L2_LEARN_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: General properties of the learn FILTER

Field.Description: If set, filter examines each entry before transmission; if it is a duplicate, it is dropped and a counter is incremented.
Field.Name: LEARN_FILTER_DROP_DUPLICATE

Field.Description: Entry Time to leave in Filter, counted in LearnFilterResolution units
Field.Name: LEARN_FILTER_ENTRY_TTL

AppDB.Name: L2_LEARN_PAYLOAD_BUILD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Rules for building the learn payload

AppDB.Name: ING_VSI_LEARN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress VSI context.

AppDB.Name: L2_LEARN_KEY_CONSTRUCTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress VSI context.

AppDB.Name: L2_LEARN_FORMAT_INDEX_TO_VMV
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map 2 bits entry format index to 6 bits vmv.

Field.Description: Format of mdb entry
Field.Name: MDB_VMV

AppDB.Name: L2_LEARN_FORMAT_INDEX_FROM_VMV
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map 6 bits vmv to 2 bits entry format index.

AppDB.Name: L2_AGE_SCAN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure L2 Age Scan

Field.Description: Trigger an age scan if it is set to 1
Field.Name: AGE_SCAN_TRIGGER

AppDB.Name: OLP_JR_TO_JR_2_TRANSLATION_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configuration for mapping from JR-DSP to INT-DSP

Field.Description: 6b VMV for JR2 Int-DSP/Event when in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_TO_JR_2_VMV

Field.Description: 4b Rbd/Age for JR2 Int-DSP/Event when in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_TO_JR_2_AGE

Field.Description: 6b App-db for JR2 Int-DSP/Event when in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_TO_JR_2_APP_DB

Field.Description: 10b Key73:64 Mask JR2 Int-DSP/Event when in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_TO_JR_2_KEY_MASK

Field.Description: Cmd type 000 (delete) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_DELETE

Field.Description: Cmd type 001 (Insert) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_INSERT

Field.Description: Cmd type 010 (Refresh) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_REFRESH

Field.Description: Cmd type 011 (Learn) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_LEARN

Field.Description: Cmd type 100 (Defrag) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_DEFRAG

Field.Description: Cmd type 101 (Ack) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_ACK

Field.Description: Cmd type 110 (Move) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_TRANSPLANT

Field.Description: Cmd type 111 (Change-Fail) in JR mode.
Field.Name: JR_CMD_TYPE_CHANGE_FAIL

Field.Description: Used as initial value for the Jr2_learn_payload, required to create the constants on the payload (type, Entry-Strength, etc).
Field.Name: EEI_AND_FEC_INIT_VALUE

Field.Description: Used as initial value for the Jr2_learn_payload, required to create the constants on the payload (type, Entry-Strength, etc).
Field.Name: LIF_AND_DESTINATION_INIT_VALUE

Field.Description: Define the configuration for Learn Command Destination Offset.
Field.Name: DESTINATION_OFFSET

Field.Description: Define the configuration for Learn Command OutLif Offset.
Field.Name: OUT_LIF_OFFSET

Field.Description: Define the configuration for Learn Command Eei Offset.
Field.Name: EEI_OFFSET

Field.Description: Define the configuration for Learn Command Fec Offset.
Field.Name: FEC_OFFSET

AppDB.Name: OLP_JR_2_TO_JR_TRANSLATION_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configuration For payload translation from JR2 to JR

Field.Description: 4b logical db_type to be used in key73:70 for JR DSP.
Field.Name: LOGICAL_DB_TYPE

Field.Description: Cmd type 000 (Insert) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_INSERT

Field.Description: Cmd type 001 (Transplant) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_TRANSPLANT

Field.Description: Cmd type 010 (Delete) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_DELETE

Field.Description: Cmd type 011 (Refresh) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_REFRESH

Field.Description: Cmd type 100 (Learn) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_LEARN

Field.Description: Cmd type 101 (Ack) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_ACK

Field.Description: Cmd type 110 (Flush Reply) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_FLUSH_REPLY

Field.Description: Cmd type 111 (NOP) in JR2 mode.
Field.Name: JR_2_CMD_TYPE_NOP
